entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.7.0 - 09/19/2024

New Features

  • Drag and drop document blocks
  • Use an attachment as a card cover / Set a card cover
  • Configure self-hosted server URL through Settings on the startup page
  • Support "Ask AI" on multiple blocks of text
  • Add a code block using triple backticks
  • Customize the document width in Settings
  • Add color backgrounds for the group names in Kanban boards

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issues with the single backtick
  • Fixed filter bugs
  • Fixed a bug where "Untitled" overrode the name of the row
  • Fixed page title not updating after renaming from the "More" menu
  • Several more bug fixes

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.7.1 - 07/10/2024

New Features

  • Copy link to share and open it in a browser
  • Enable the ability to edit the page title within the body of the document
  • Filter by last modified, created at, or a date range
  • Allow customization of database property icons
  • Support CTRL/CMD+X to delete the current line when the selection is collapsed in the document
  • Support window tiling on macOS
  • Add filters to grid views on mobile
  • Create and manage workspaces on mobile
  • Automatically convert property types for imported CSV files

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed calculations with filters applied
  • Fixed issues with importing data folders into a cloud account
  • Fixed French IME backtick issues
  • Fixed selection gesture bugs on mobile

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.7.2
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.7.2 - 22/10/2024

New Features

  • Import from Notion
  • Copy link to block
  • Turn content blocks into other types of content blocks
  • Enable sharing links and publishing pages on mobile
  • Enable drag-and-drop in database pages
  • Right-click in the sidebar to perform actions on pages
  • Create new subpages while typing using +, @, or, [[
  • Drag to reorder checklist items

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issue with inability to cancel inline code format in French IME
  • Fixed delete / backspace with Shift or Ctrl shortcuts not working in documents
  • Fixed the issues with incorrect time zone being used in filters
  • Fixed date issues when including time

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.7.3
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.7.3 - 07/11/2024

New Features

  • Enable custom URLs for published pages
  • Support toggling headings
  • Create a subpage by typing in the document
  • Turn selected blocks into a subpage
  • Add a manual date picker for the Date property

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where the workspace owner was unable to delete spaces created by others
  • Fixed cursor height inconsistencies with text height
  • Fixed editing issues in Kanban cards
  • Fixed an issue preventing images or files from being dropped into empty paragraphs

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.7.4
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.7.4 - 19/11/2024

New Features

  • Manage spaces on mobile
  • Add toggle headings on mobile
  • Improve the AI chat page UI
  • Support uploading WebP and BMP images

Bug Fixes

  • Optimize workspace menu loading performance
  • Optimize tab switching performance
  • Fix issues with find and replace
